name: Spec Completion Monitor
description: Automatically creates completion status when all tasks in a spec are completed

trigger.description: Triggers when tasks.md files are saved in any spec directory

conditions.description: Verify all tasks are marked as completed with [x]

actions.description: Create completion status files for completed specs
actions.prompt:
I need you to run the spec completion monitor to check if all tasks in the recently modified spec are completed. If they are, create the appropriate completion status files.

Please execute: python .kiro/hooks/spec-completion-agent.py {spec_directory}

Where {spec_directory} is the directory containing the modified tasks.md file.

The agent will:
1. Parse the tasks.md file to count completed vs total tasks
2. If all tasks are completed, create a .completed status file
3. Generate a completion summary document
4. Provide feedback on the completion status
